text: Weiskirchen is a municipality in Merzig-Wadern in Saarland, Germany. It is in the Hunsrück, about 20 km northeast of Merzig and 25 km southeast of Trier. == Districts == * Konfeld * Rappweiler-Zwalbach * Thailen * Weierweiler * Weiskirchen == Mayors == * 1974–1982: Peter Kolling (CDU) * 1982–2002: Bernd Theobald (CDU) * 2002–2018: Werner Hero (CDU) * since 2018: Wolfgang Hübschen (CDU) == Twin towns == * Bourbonne-les-Bains, France, since 1997 == References == == Other websites == * Official website Category:Merzig-Wadern
title: Weiskirchen
